text: Maracanã Stadium, (Portuguese: Estádio do Maracanã) standard Brazilian Portuguese: , local pronunciation: ), officially Estádio Jornalista Mário Filho, is a multi purpose (used for different events) stadium in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. It can hold around 78,838 people. ==Sources== Category:Football stadiums in Brazil Category:Buildings and structures in Rio de Janeiro Category:1950 establishments Category:1950s establishments in Brazil Category:Football in Rio de Janeiro
title: Maracanã Stadium
